::Galaxor::

Galaxor stumbles back as the shots hit, denting his armor. He fires 
two more missiles at Abominus, and then jumps forward and slashes at 
him with his sword.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Abominus/Surgital::
> 
>     Abominus moved a little, but was still hit in the head and 
chest by the missiles.  He stumbled back quite far actually, 5 steps 
is kinda far for a gestalt to stumble back from a normal heighted 
warrior's perspective.  Abominus snarled meanly at Galaxor, then 
fired 2 beams from the lazer from his lower chest.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Surgital heard the lightning bolt, and quickly turned around 
and side-stepped just in time to avoid the lightning bolt by a speck 
or two.  Then, Surgital converted his hand into a saw blade again, 
and this time shot the saw blade at Lavatron's head.  (BTW, the blade 
was shot vertical, so moving to the side gives a better chance of 
dodging it.)
